sqlMap.select: select ID, OPTIMISTIC_LOCK, NOTE, ORGAN_ID, LOGON_NAME, F_PASSWORD, F_NAME, NAMING, AGE, SEX, MOBILE, EMAIL, PHONE, IS_SUSPENDED, SESSION_MAX_AMOUNT, BIND_SOFTDOG, CREATETIME, STD_ID, PRIORITY, MONITOR_ROLE, PERMISSION_MODE, PERMISSION_CHANGE, EXPIRED_DAY, BILL_MODE, DISPATCH_SERVER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT, IS_PHONE_NOTIFY, IS_EMAIL_NOTIFY, SMS_SEND_RULE, AUDIO_ID, AUDIO_SEND_RULE, IS_AUDIO_NOTIFY, VIP, IS_MSP, BRANCH_ID, GRADE, POSITION, IS_BRANCH_MANAGE, ACCESS_SERVER_ID, IS_INNER_USER from T_USER where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

select ID, OPTIMISTIC_LOCK, NOTE, ORGAN_ID, LOGON_NAME, F_PASSWORD, F_NAME, NAMING, AGE, SEX, MOBILE, EMAIL, PHONE, IS_SUSPENDED, SESSION_MAX_AMOUNT, BIND_SOFTDOG, CREATETIME, STD_ID, PRIORITY, MONITOR_ROLE, PERMISSION_MODE, PERMISSION_CHANGE, EXPIRED_DAY, BILL_MODE, DISPATCH_SERVER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT, IS_PHONE_NOTIFY, IS_EMAIL_NOTIFY, SMS_SEND_RULE, AUDIO_ID, AUDIO_SEND_RULE, IS_AUDIO_NOTIFY, VIP, IS_MSP, BRANCH_ID, GRADE, POSITION, IS_BRANCH_MANAGE, ACCESS_SERVER_ID, IS_INNER_USER from T_USER
order by $orderByClause$
